comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Hey all: Young Master Burton and I will be mountain biking up Flagstaff Rd today--if anyone cares to join us, please feel welcome. Departing from the North side of Humanities (I must store my assistant Caili in the back of my truck for the duration of the ride) at 12PM! RL

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Please allow me to clarify the previous statement from my esteemed colleague Mr. Leary. While he must still store his assistant in his truck, we will be meeting the group at the standard meeting place for this route -- Telecom -- at the prescribed time, 12:00 p.m. We sincerely hope to see you there! MCB
